acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Page County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Dr. John Bell practiced medicine in Page County during the mid-19th century.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Daybook, 1861-1862, of Doctor John Bell that records transactions in chronological order. Information recorded in the daybook includes date of transaction, name of patient, type of transaction, and cost of transaction. Types of transactions include visits to patients, drug prescriptions, and other medical services.
